sicsim.network.peers
Class AbstractPeer

java.lang.Object
  sicsim.network.peers.AbstractPeer
Direct Known Subclasses:
BandwidthPeer
public abstract class AbstractPeer
extends java.lang.Object

Peers simulated in the system have to implement this abstract class

          An instance of bandwidth structure that is used by 'BandwidthPeer'.

Field Detail

nodeId

protected NodeId nodeId
The node id of the peer.

link

protected AbstractLink link
An instance of the link that connects the peer to the core network.

bandwidth

protected Bandwidth bandwidth
An instance of bandwidth structure that is used by 'BandwidthPeer'.

failureDetector

protected FailureDetector failureDetector
An instance of failure detector. The peer can subscribes in failure detector for peers of interest.

overlay

protected OverlayNetwork overlay
The overlay network. The peer can get information about other peers in the overlay network by using 'overlay'.

monitor

protected Monitor monitor
The Monitor. The peer can use monitor to verify its behaviour.

listeners

protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,PeerEventListener> listeners
An array for listening to all event types that peer can listen to

                 AbstractLink link,
                 Bandwidth bandwidth,
                 FailureDetector failureDetector,
                 OverlayNetwork overlay,
                 Monitor monitor)
Initialize the peer.

create

public abstract void create(long currentTime)
An abstract method that called by simulator when the first peer comes to the system.

Parameters:
currentTime - The current time of the system.

join

public abstract void join(long currentTime)
An abstract method that called by simulator whenever a peer joins the system, except the first peer.

Parameters:
currentTime - The current time of the system.

leave

public abstract void leave(long currentTime)
An abstract method that called by simulator whenever a peer decides to leave the system.

Parameters:
currentTime - The current time of the system.

failure

public abstract void failure(NodeId failedId,
                             long currentTime)
Notification that a peer has failed. The peer must have already subscribed for the failure of this peer. This is an abstract method.

Parameters:
failedId - The node that has failed.
currentTime - The current time of the system.

receive

public abstract void receive(NodeId srcId,
                             Message msg,
                             long currentTime)
Receive a message from another peer. Called by the simulator when a message is received for this peer. This is an abstract method.

Parameters:
srcId - Node id of message source.
msg - The message that source has sent.
currentTime - The current time of the system.

signal

public abstract void signal(int signal,
                            long currentTime)
An abstract method that receives a signal from simulator. Called by the simulator when a the simulator sends a signal to the peer.

Parameters:
signal - The signal number.
currentTime - The current time of the system.

syncMethod

public abstract void syncMethod(long currentTime)
A Synchronized method that is called in each time unit. This feature is disabled by default, and can be enabled by setting 'true' the SicsSimConfig.SYNC_UPDATE. This is an abstract method.

Parameters:
currentTime - The current time of the system.
See Also:
SicsimConfig

toString

public abstract java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object

restore

public abstract void restore(java.lang.String status)
An abstract method that restores the saved status of the peer.

Parameters:
status - The saved status of the peer. This status should be parsed and restores the local value of the peer.

registerEvents

protected abstract void registerEvents()
Registers the handler for receiving messages. This is an abstract method.

addEventListener

protected void addEventListener(java.lang.String eventType,
                                PeerEventListener listener)
Add an event listener. This method will override the previous listener

Parameters:
eventType - Event to subscribe from.
listener - The listener for event.

removeEventListener

protected void removeEventListener(java.lang.String eventType)
Remove an event listener.

Parameters:
eventType - event to unsubscribe from.

sendMsg

protected void sendMsg(NodeId destId,
                       Message msg)
Sends a message to another peer.

Parameters:
destId - The node id of destination peer.
msg - The message that peer sends to the destination peer.

loopback

protected void loopback(Message msg,
                        long time)
A peer can send a message to itself by calling this method.

Parameters:
msg - The message that peer sends to itself.
time - The delay that this message will be received by the peer.

broadcast

protected void broadcast(Message msg)
Broadcasts a message to all the peers in the overlay network, not all the peer in the system.

Parameters:
msg - The message that peer broadcasts.

sendSim

protected void sendSim(Message msg)
Sends a message to the simulator.

Parameters:
msg - The message that peer sends to simulator.

getId

public NodeId getId()
Get the identifier of this peer.

Returns:
The node id of the peer.

getLinkLatency

public int getLinkLatency()
Get the link latency of this peer.

Returns:
The link latency of this peer.

getStateString

public java.lang.String getStateString(java.lang.Class<?> peer,
                                       java.lang.Class<?> link)
Returns the status of the peer that should be saved. This method should be called inside the 'toString' of a peer who inheritance from this peer. The local information of child class should be added at the end of the returning string of this method.

Parameters:
peer - The class of peer.
link - The class of link.
Returns:
A string that contains the information of status of this peer.
